titleInfo.title: On the optimal structure of recovering set pairs in lattices: the sandglass conjecture

mods.abstract: We present a conjecture concerning the optimal structure of a subset pair satisfying two dual requirements in a lattice that can be derived as the product of k finite length chains. The conjecture is proved for k=2.
